text.str:
NORWOOD POLICE DEPARTMENT
MISSING PERSON

MARK WALLACE

[Photograph: two muscular adult men posing for a selfie in a fitness gym.  The one on the right is blurred out.]

MISSING FROM: Norwood MA
DATE MISSING: April 23
AGE: 33
HEIGHT: 6'0"
WEIGHT: 196 Lbs
HAIR: brown ponytail with goatee

Mark was last seen on April 23 at 7:23 PM., leaving BWZ Fitness Center on Allen Road.  He was seen wearing a gray polo shirt, khaki pants and white running shoes carrying a blue duffel bag.  His 2005 Opel Agila was found abandoned in a nearby parking lot.  Mr. Wallace does not have a history of going missing and his family is concerned about his well-being.

CAN YOU HELP?
PLEASE CALL NORWOOD POLICE DEPARTMENT
781-555-2394

Callers may remain anonymous and information will be treated confidentially.
text.//~: Please replace the fictitious phone number with one of your local equivalent when translating

MISSING PERSON SUSPICIOUS CIRCUMSTANCES
CALL: FRAMINGHAM POLICE DEPT. AT (508)555-4957

Lee M. Younce

[Photograph: employee identification photo of a stern-looking man in his early fifties wearing a formal office shirt.]
Have you seen me?

Male, Asian, 50 years old
5'7", 150-155 lbs, hazel eyes, black hair (buzzcut), goatee

MISSING PERSON SUFFERS FROM SCHIZOPHRENIA AND HAS NOT BEEN TAKING HIS PRESCRIPTION MEDICATION

Mr. Younce was last seen leaving his residence on 760 Christie Way, Groton, on April 14, at approximately 7 am.  He was wearing a formal gray shirt, black jeans, dress shoes and was seen carrying a blue briefcase.  His 2018 Chevrolet Bolt was discovered in Groton Town Forest with his wallet and cellphone inside.  Mr. Younce is believed to be in the Hickory Hills Lake area.

FOR CURRENT INFORMATION & HOW TO HELP

CALL FRAMINGHAM POLICE DEPT. AT (508)555-4957

text.str:
Bring her home.  Your help is needed.

MISSING PERSON
$50,000 REWARD

[Photograph: a middle-aged woman with shoulder-length black hair in a cropped group photo.]

A $50,000 reward is being offered for anyone willing to come forward with new information that leads to finding Shayla Kaplan.

On March 12 Shayla Kaplan was last seen leaving her residence on 445 Huntz Lane, Franklin, MA.  She has not been heard from since.

She was 43 years old at the time of her disappearance.  She was described as a Native American female with shoulder-length black hair and brown eyes.  She was 5'5" tall and weighed 153 lbs.

If you have any information about what may have happened to her, please contact the number below.
  > Call: (508)555-5918
  > Or text information to: (508)555-1711
text.//~: Please replace the fictitious phone number with one of your local equivalent when translating

text.str:
Bedford Police Department
2 Mudge Way
Bedford, MA 01730
PHONE: 781-555-2788

[Photograph: police mugshot of a distraught young woman with long blonde hair.]

Bedford Police Department Missing Persons Unit Investigators are asking for the public's help locating Sophia Breece.  She lives on 4307 Lyon Avenue, Worcester, and was last seen on April 30 at approximately 6 p.m.

Mrs. Breece is a female Caucasian 30 years old, 5'3" tall, 100-105 pounds, blonde curled hair, with blue eyes.

MP has a history of substance abuse.  Her loved ones are very worried and asking for your help locating her.

Anyone with information is asked to call Bedford Police Department Missing Persons Unit at 781-555-2788

text.str:
MISSING

[Photograph: a female hiker with a large backpack and trekking sticks hiking in the mountains.]

Vivian Sanchez
Missing since March 17th

Sex: Female
Race: Hispanic
Age at missing: 28
Missing from: Foxborough, MA
Height: 5'7"
Weight: 125-130 lbs
Eyes: Green
Hair: Brown

Missing person (MP), Vivian Sanchez, day hiked on the Simons Trail from Simons Outhouse to Simons Springwater on Saturday, March 17th.  She was last seen on trail cam on Surry Trail, west of Simons Clearwater at 11:47 am, taking a shortcut to Simons Outhouse.  She was last seen wearing leather hiking boots, pink leg warmers, blue nylon shorts, a reflective windbreaker and a multicolored knit hat with a fuzzy ball on top.

If you have seen this missing person, please contact the law enforcement agency listed below:
Foxborough Police Department - 781-555-7514

text.text:
HELP US FIND LELA!
IF YOU'VE SEEN HER PLEASE CALL 911

[Photograph: a teenaged girl in a knitted hoodie taking a selfie with a flower.]

PLEASE SPREAD THE WORD: "Find Lela Otten" on Facebook!

Lela Otten is 15 and went missing on 16 March at around 16:30.  She was last seen at the park on Lincoln Street, Easton.  She was wearing a dark green shirt with striped jeans.  Lela suffers from epilepsy and we are very worried about her.  Please come home soon, Lela.  We all miss you and want you home safe.

MAKE A DIFFERENCE TO FAMILIES THAT NEED YOUR HELP - VISIT
www.together-again.org

text.str:

Sophie was last seen at Adele Addison Elementary School located at 2666 Burke Street, Springfield at approximately 4 p.m. on April 20.
Sophie was last seen wearing a purple sweater, a dark blue knee-length skirt and a 'My Little Pony' backpack.

HELP LAIKA COME HOME!

[Illustration: a mixed-breed dog wearing a fishbowl helmet, floating in space.]

Last seen on 3 November 1957 orbiting Earth in a spaceship.  If found, please return to Baikonur Cosmodrome, Kazakhstan.

text.str:
MISSING
PLEASE CHECK PICTURE/SHEDS/GARAGES

[Photograph: a black-and-white shorthair cat sleeping in a sunbeam.]

Schmeeda is a black female short-haired cat with a large white spot on her back.  She wears a deep blue collar with a small bell attached to it.  She went missing on 19th March at around midnight.  She is microchipped.

$500 REWARD OFFERED

IF YOU HAVE ANY INFORMATION:
CALL 857-555-3146
text.//~: Please replace the fictitious phone number with one of your local equivalent when translating

text.str:
LOST PET!
Please help me find my cat!

[Photograph: a ginger longhair cat rolled over on his back, playing with dangling feathers.]

 ● His name is Charlie
 ● He has greenish-yellow eyes
 ● Ginger in color, long-haired
 ● Likes playing, especially with laser pointers
 ● Last seen on Flint Street, Charlton

If sighted, please call Martha at:
978-555-5467

text.str:
LOST CAT

 - ADULT BLACK & BROWN MALE MAINE COON CAT
 - WHITE ON NECK AND MUZZLE
 - WEARS REFLECTIVE GREEN COLLAR

[Photograph: a large cat with a dense coat of fur sleeping in a plastic lawn chair.  He looks uncomfortable.]

Loki from Shutesbury, MA.

TAKE A PIC IF YOU CAN + PLEASE DON'T CHASE
617-555-9958

text.str:
MISSING CAT ALERT

781-555-2647

[Photograph: a slender white cat with a grayish face peeking out a small cardboard box.]

This adorable Siamese cat is called COCOA.
He is new to the area and escaped out of the door.  He is microchipped and has a name tag on his collar.  He is very nervous around strangers and may flee if he thinks you are going to catch him.

If you see him or think you have seen a purrson like him, please call me ASAP.  We love him and miss him dearly.
text.//~: Please replace the fictitious phone number with one of your local equivalent when translating

text.str:
!! HELP ME !!
My name is Pippa and I am lost!

[Photograph: a long-haired cat with a round face and short muzzle sitting on a floral carpet.]

I'm getting on with age, so I don't remember how to get home.  I am a (traditional) Persian longhair with silky white fur and brownish eyes.  I was wearing a red collar with my name tag on it.

PLEASE CALL (413)555-1688 IF YOU SEE ME
(AND TAKE A PICTURE IF YOU CAN)
text.//~: Please replace the fictitious phone number with one of your local equivalent when translating

text.str:
MISSING CAT

[Photograph: a shorthair cat with rosette markings training its claws on a scratching post.]

Cheddar is a male 3.5 y/o brown Bengal cat who went missing on April 8.  She was last seen wearing a striped collar.

IF YOU SEE HIM, CONTACT US IMMEDIATELY: 978-555-3760

YOU CAN HELP!
Please photograph this poster and share it on social media.
text.//~: Please replace the fictitious phone number with one of your local equivalent when translating

text.str:
DEXTER IS LOST!
AGAIN!!!  He was scared off by the neighbor's dogs on 6th May & doesn't know how to get home…
…he's not very clever at finding his way back!
He's a 3 y/o male Devon Rex cat with soft gray fur and big blue eyes.
He's chipped and should be wearing a yellow collar with a tag that has his name & my phone number on it.

[Photograph: a short-haired gray cat sitting next to four similar-looking felines.  Dexter is circled in and has a bright red arrow pointing at him.]

IF YOU SEE MY DEXTER, PLEASE DIAL 978-555-8152!

!!!REWARD OFFERED!!!
text.//~: Please replace the fictitious phone number with one of your local equivalent when translating

text.text:
ATTENTION
MISSING CAT

[Photograph: a hairless, wrinkled cat with lemon-shaped eyes wearing a striped T-shirt.]

RAMSES went missing from the car park at Companion Care Vets in Oakland on 30th March.
He is a Canadian Sphynx with a gray spot covering its stomach.
She is wearing a striped T-shirt and a pink collar.

If found, please contact me at: ifoundramsesthecat@gmail.com

text.str:
HAVE YOU SEEN MARBLES?

[Photograph: a gray cat with gently curving stripes covering its body.  It stares at the camera as if it's hypnotized by it.]

MARBLES IS VERY FRIENDLY AND ENERGETIC.  MISSING SINCE THE EVENING OF MARCH 21.  IF SPOTTED OR FOUND, PLEASE CALL ME AT 774-555-9361.

THANK YOU!!!
text.//~: Please replace the fictitious phone number with one of your local equivalent when translating

text.str:
PLEASE PLEASE HELP ME!

[Photograph: a longhaired tri-color cat with heterochromia lying on top of a cat tree.]

My name is Buttons and I'm a calico cat with large orange and black patches.  My left eye is blue and the other is green.  I went missing on the evening of April 15th and I haven't been seen since.  I love people and will come if called.

IF YOU HAVE SEEN BUTTONS, PLEASE DON'T HESITATE TO CONTACT ME: 508-555-1050
text.//~: Please replace the fictitious phone number with one of your local equivalent when translating
